text: Hagi Hesboni kumate'ma nemaniza vahe'mota tamasunku huta zavi ateho, na'ankure Ai rankumara eme eri haviza hanageno moriri huno marerigahie. Hagi Raba kumate vahe'mota tamasunku kukena huta zavira neteta freta vuta kuma keginamofo agu'afi ome frakiho. Na'ankure Moleki havi anumzane, pristi vahe'ane eri'za vahe'anena zamavare'za ru moparega kina ome huzamantegahaze.
